h3.a: Apr 6 Update: In-Person School Closed for Remainder of Year

div.div: Update from Superintendent Bingham about today's update from Governor Inslee and OSPI Superintendent Reykdal

h3.a: Crescent Hosting "Town-Hall" Style Zoom Meetings Each Wednesday

div.div: Each Wednesday, members of the Crescent community are invited to join at 5:30 p.m. for an update on the school closure and other community announcements.

h3.a: Crescent School video/phone conference/Town-Hall style meeting

div.div: Crescent School video/phone conference/Town-Hall style meeting for Parents and community members at 5:30 PM on Wednesday April 1

h3.a: Free Meals for kids: Model Changing to "Drop Zones"

div.div: Starting Monday March 23, we are changing from delivering meals to homes to 3 drop zones...
We provide a quality education for every student in a safe and supportive environment.
We focus on student success, relevant learning experiences, and building a strong, family-like community.
We provide encouragement and support necessary for every student to become a life-long learner and a contributing citizen.
